channel.title: Unix - Totally re-done
channel.description:
[ul][center][URL=http://img31.imageshack.us/i/unixx.png/][IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/6533/unixx.png[/img][/URL]
I've decided to create [i][b]Unix[/b][/i] because I have so much spare time on my hands, not only do I have time but I just want to release a very [i][b]unique[/b][/i] Project Insanity with [i][b]fully[/b][/i], [b]not[/b] half-arsed but fully working skills with unique events such as; Birds nests, Evil chicken etc. I guess from reading this introduction you've probaly given up, mainly because I said Project Insanity. Project Insanity isn't all that bad when it's in the right hands. I'm going to totally re-package [i][b]Unix[/b][/i] and maybe start on my own Framework. I'll be trying to delete code that isn't effcient to my liking (isn't processing fast enough) or isn't being used! Thanks to [b]WinterCannon[/b] I'll be implementing his [i][b]OrphanAPI[/b][/i] which makes use of timing using nanoseconds as opposed to milliseconds and the time the thread takes to sleep and wakeup. This will make the improper timing through [i][b]WinterLove[/b][/i] (which causes lagg in walk and updating) to be fixed and should hopefully run alot more effciently. Instead of making [i][b]Unix[/b][/i] have simple teleports in the magic book, edgeville home and 'click thieveing' money, I've decided to make it '[i][b]world-wide[/b][/i]', using every single aspect of the world map: Every single dungeon will be used, every single NPC [i][b]will[/b][/i] be in their position and so forth.
[size=24pt][b]Progress Log[/b][/size]
[b][size=10pt][u]Client work - I'm not putting various dates for certain reasons.[/u][/size][/b]
New orb system New models New sprites FullScreen mode [Hd] for more experience gaming
[b][size=10pt][u]Server work - I'm not putting various dates for certain reasons.[/u][/size][/b]
Downloaded the source New teleport system Started on the re-packaging Deleted most code that wasn't being used Finished the new magic system, you can watch the new magic system and teleportion system 60% dungeons complete [used] 96% all npc dump Stripped most of the Server Traveling: Glory, ring of dueling, games necklace, spirit tree and fairy rings so far 49% proper objects being using, e.g: Thieveing at Ape Atoll (Banana stall, receive bananas) Improved Wilderness system Thieveing's data is now stored as [b]int stallData[][] = { // stall, lvl, xp, gold, stall intensity[/b] Mining totally re-done, though you can't mine ores yet.
[url=http://s1141.photobucket.com/albums/n584/Entinity/?action=view&current=Video.mp4]Cavalier Mask Creating.[/url] [url=http://s1141.photobucket.com/albums/n584/Entinity/?action=view&current=Genie.mp4]Genie random event.[/url] [url=http://s1141.photobucket.com/albums/n584/Entinity/?action=view&current=Maul.mp4]Granite Maul Special Attack.[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DM7MrtRvqzQ]Mini stability video (couldn't connect too many bots, as loading another 200 bots logging in at the same time would cause lagg, not the actual Server).[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OKj0LcWk3Lo]Unix - Barrows, NPC v Player combat[/url].

item.title: Unix - Totally re-done
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:25, topic:392256”]Goodluck with this, however, I do have some stuff to say in response to what you have said.

I’m going to totally re-package Unix and maybe start on my own Framework. I’ll be trying to delete code that isn’t effcient to my liking (isn’t processing fast enough) or isn’t being used!

That doesn’t make it your own framework…

Thanks to WinterCannon I’ll be implementing his OrphanAPI which makes use of timing using nanoseconds as opposed to milliseconds and the time the thread takes to sleep and wakeup. This will make the improper timing through WinterLove (which causes lagg in walk and updating) to be fixed and should hopefully run alot more effciently.

U serious?[/quote]

U serious? I know that doesn’t make it my own framework /facepalm, I was stating it was a feature I’ve added for the updating and walking to be fixed -.-. People can’t read these days.

Read full topic

I know what source you are using and it doesn’t look like you did anything.

Thanks to WinterCannon I’ll be implementing his OrphanAPI which makes use of timing using nanoseconds as opposed to milliseconds and the time the thread takes to sleep and wakeup. This will make the improper timing through WinterLove (which causes lagg in walk and updating) to be fixed and should hopefully run alot more effciently.
[/quote]
U serious?[/quote]
Would you mind stating or PMing me a justification of why you hate OrathanAPI?

Read full topic
